title: Advance Budget Planner, expand quizzes to 100, replace blog library with 15+ SEO long-form posts, and refresh theme + sidebar styling

requirements.text: Enhance the Budget Planner experience to be more advanced and realistic by adding additional financial insights and visualizations: include at least one line chart (e.g., cashflow/savings projection over time) and ensure a clear pie chart breakdown is presented; add explicit guidance sections that answer how to improve personal finances with actionable suggestions on saving, investing, and next steps based on the user inputs.

quotes: Make buget planner more advance add more features and realistic showing line chart poe chart etc it need to answer about saving invest and how to improve you finance

acceptanceCriteria: Budget Planner results include a line chart visualization derived from the user’s entered inputs and computed plan data.
Budget Planner results include a pie chart breakdown of expenses/allocations (existing pie chart is acceptable if retained and clearly shown in results).

Budget Planner results include a dedicated guidance area that provides actionable suggestions related to saving, investing, and improving finances, and the content changes in response to different inputs (e.g., risk tolerance, goal type, savings rate).
All user-facing text added/updated is in English.

requirements.text: Increase the quiz question library to at least 100 unique finance quiz questions and ensure the app actually uses them (i.e., the quiz initialization and quiz flow should reflect 100+ total questions rather than only a small set). Questions must cover a broad set of personal finance topics, including saving strategies, budgeting methods, investing for beginners, stock market basics, mutual funds, SIP investing, and emergency funds.

quotes: It still showing only 2 quiz make 100 unique quiz

acceptanceCriteria: Quiz question source data contains 100+ unique questions with unique IDs and non-duplicated prompts.
The authenticated quiz UI shows totalQuestions >= 100 in the quiz statistics/progress display once initialized.
Questions span the requested topics (saving, budgeting, investing, stock market basics, mutual funds, SIP, emergency funds).
Initialization prompt and any helper text remains accurate (no mention of only 2 questions).
All user-facing text added/updated is in English.

requirements.text: Remove/replace all existing content shown on the Blogs page and publish a new library of at least 15 SEO-focused long-form blog posts (minimum 800+ words each) about personal finance, written to address real-world problems with practical solutions. The set must include posts that cover: Personal finance, Saving strategies, Budgeting methods, Investing for beginners, Stock market basics, Mutual funds, SIP investment, and Emergency funds.

quotes: Remove all blogs which in blogs page and add new seo written content 10 blogs with real world problems solving 800 words plus

acceptanceCriteria: The Blogs page no longer displays the previous short problem/solution entries and instead lists 15+ new posts.
Each blog post is long-form content with 800+ words (measured by rendered text word count, excluding nav/footer).
The 15+ posts collectively cover all listed topics; each post has a clear real-world problem framing and solution-oriented structure.
All user-facing text is in English.
No remnants of the previous blog titles/problems/solutions remain on the Blogs page.

requirements.text: Update the app’s overall background styling to remove the current purple/violet/blue-heavy background look and replace it with a more creative, advanced theme applied consistently across both public pages (unauthenticated) and private/authenticated pages.

quotes: Change background colour of purple violet blue background like creative and advanced for both private and public pages

acceptanceCriteria: Public pages and authenticated pages use the updated background theme consistently (no remaining dominant purple/violet/blue gradient backgrounds on main page containers).
The new theme still preserves readability and contrast for cards, text, and charts.
All user-facing text remains in English.

requirements.text: Restyle the authenticated app sidebar to be dark and use green hover effects for navigation items, while preserving current navigation structure and active-state clarity.

quotes: Sidebar should be dark with green hover effects,

acceptanceCriteria: Desktop sidebar background is dark (not a violet gradient).
Navigation items show green hover effects (text/background/border or accent), distinct from the active state.
Active item remains clearly distinguishable from hover state.
No changes break mobile navigation behavior.

requirements.text: Resolve the internal contradiction between the current repository requirement that forbids quiz changes and the new request to add 100+ questions by updating the internal requirement documentation so it no longer instructs developers to avoid quiz question additions for this build.

quotes: It still showing only 2 quiz make 100 unique quiz

acceptanceCriteria: The internal requirement document `frontend/src/requirements/REQ-10-quiz-no-changes.md` is updated to reflect that quiz content expansion is now required (i.e., it no longer states that no new quiz questions should be introduced).
The updated documentation does not prohibit modifications needed to implement 100+ quiz questions.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in `backend/main.mo`); add `backend/migration.mo` only if existing stable state requires migration.
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose using existing components).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not add third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity).
Do not add external databases or off-chain storage systems.
Do not add real-time WebSocket/chat features beyond what already exists.
Do not generate or embed financial advice that claims personalization by a licensed advisor; keep educational framing consistent with existing disclaimers.
